text: The 2014 FIRS B-World Cup was the 16th edition of the Roller Hockey B World Championship. It was an official competition organized by CIRH. The competition was host in Canelones, Uruguay from 15 to 22 November. ==Venues== Canelones was the host city of the tournament, and the Rink will be enclosed the Sergio Matto stadium.
